name: Little Ghost Project
description:
"With the wave of my hand, and a well-placed moan

I have swept the very bravest off their feet ”

Nightmare Before Christmas

What if Death was not the End ? 

Little Ghost Project is a story driven adventure game, which aims at being a tribute to point’n click adventure games of yesteryears from Ron Gilbert and Tim Schafer, such as Monkey Island, Maniac Mansion or Grim Fandango; mixed with more modern inspiration such as Life is Strange by Dontnod, or Detroit: Become Human by Quantic Dream.

The game will feature 3D graphics with hand-painted textures depicting a world of the dead inspired by Tim Burton’s movies aesthetics such as “The Nighmare Before Christmas”, “Beetlejuice” or “Corpse Bride”, on an original fun and satirical story, crowded with colourful characters to please gamers of all ages.

Overview

  • Genres: Adventure / Reflexion / Point’n click
  • Target : 15 - 30 years old
  • PEGI : 7+
  • Platforms : PC / PlayStation 5 / Xbox Series X|S

Features

  • An enchanted and funny story, crowded with eccentric characters!
  • Engage in Grimace Duels against other spooks!
  • Explore an entire 3D world in a wonderful hand painted environment making Death more Living than ever!
  • Enigmas: solve wacky enigmas and terrify the living to collect ectoplasm!
  • EctoVision Spectacles: you’ll never be blocked thanks to the smart system of the EctoVision Spectacles! Twitch compatibility.

Scrypt

MacMillan is a tiny ghost who dreams of becoming the greatest Wraith of all times and to haunt the world of the living. But he is… Clumsy. After causing a disaster at the Wraith Academy, the little ghost takes on a crazy and burlesque adventure which leads him far beyond the world of the dead and changes him forever!

Play as MacMillan, a wannabe Wraith, in a burlesque and colorful universe. Meet fantastically grotesque characters and travel through both worlds. Discover a surprising story full of adventures and twists! Take the lead and help MacMillan to discover the origins of his amazing power. Solve wacky enigmas and engage in epic Grimace Duels with other spooks throughout this adventure that will immerse you in a world inspired by Tim Burton’s cinema!
